name: Quickfingers Gloves
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Halflings/New Racial Rules/Halfling Magic Items/Quickfingers Gloves

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, cat's grace, haste

sections.body: These dark-colored, skin-tight gloves are typically made of either supple calfskin or silk. A wearer of these gloves with at least 1 rank in Sleight of Hand can perform such a check as a move action by taking a –10 penalty on the check rather than the normal –20. Both gloves must be worn for the magic to be effective.
